name: Theories in Interaction Design
description:
Hey there! Let's keep this short and sweet guys :)


  • Theories in interaction design is a master of design course I am taking in the HK poly U.
  • I share insights and understanding of (mostly) everything in this class.
  • Since this class is a 100% reading and a semi self-taught class, I will be providing you all the readings I've read this school quarter.
  • Lastly, have fun and download them here :)
